REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0649 reute d f BC-BAYER-<BAYRY>-MAKES-U 03-02 0069

TEXT.TITLE: BAYER <BAYRY> MAKES U.S. ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Bayer AG of West Germany said it has acquired Wyrough and Loser Inc of Trenton, a maker of rubbr processing chemicals, for undisclosed terms. It said its Mobay Corp subsidiary will transfer its entire U.S. Rhein-Chemie Rheinau GmbH specialty chemicals business for the rubber, plastics and lube oil industries to Wyrough and Loser later this year. Reuter
